text: Ralph J. Lamberti (born November 14, 1934) is an American politician. He was born in New York City. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Lamberti was borough president of Staten Island, New York from 1984 to 1989. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Staten Island borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ralph J. Lamberti
